jot.math.geometry

Class Transformations

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.Transformations

  • public class Transformations
extends Object
    Class that implements geometric transformations given a vector, i.e.,shear, rotate, scale, and translate.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • scale

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D scale(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D v,
                                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D offset)
        A scaling matrix has a scale multiplier for each axis. Essentially, it adjusts the length of the direction vectors in the first three columns.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector to transform.
        offset - XYZ offset.
        Returns:
        the transformed vector.

      • translate

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D translate(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D v,
                                                                                    org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D offset)
        A translation matrix is very simple. The spatial offset on each axis is assigned to a cell in the fourth column. When a vector is multiplied by it, this has an effect equivalent to adding each translation value to its corresponding vector component.
        Parameters:
        v - the vector to transform.
        offset - XYZ offset.
        Returns:
        the transformed vector.
